content.whatIsText: Smart Land Plus is an intelligent word game that combines creativity, knowledge and quick thinking. Players must find words for different categories that all start with the same letter.

howWorksSteps.title: CREATE OR JOIN ROOM:
howWorksSteps.text: Enter your name and create a new room or join an existing one.

howWorksSteps.title: SET CATEGORIES:
howWorksSteps.text: All players can add or remove categories (e.g. City, Country, River, Name, Profession, Animal, Plant).

howWorksSteps.title: GET READY:
howWorksSteps.text: All players must mark themselves as "ready" before the game starts.

howWorksSteps.title: LETTER IS CHOSEN:
howWorksSteps.text: A random letter is selected - all answers must start with this letter.

howWorksSteps.title: TIME RUNS:
howWorksSteps.text: You have a limited time (default 90 seconds) to find a suitable word for each category.

howWorksSteps.title: SUBMIT ANSWERS:
howWorksSteps.text: Once you're done or time runs out, your answers are automatically submitted.

howWorksSteps.title: AI EVALUATION:
howWorksSteps.text: Our intelligent AI evaluates all answers for correctness, creativity and uniqueness.

howWorksSteps.title: RECEIVE POINTS:
howWorksSteps.text: You receive points based on the quality of your answers and whether other players used the same words.

scoringItems.title: UNIQUE ANSWER:
scoringItems.text: Full points if only you had this answer

scoringItems.title: SHARED ANSWER:
scoringItems.text: Reduced points if other players used the same word

scoringItems.title: CREATIVITY:
scoringItems.text: Bonus points for particularly creative or unusual answers

scoringItems.title: WRONG ANSWER:
scoringItems.text: No points for words that don't fit the category or start with the wrong letter

tipsItems: Think of unusual words - they bring more points
Make sure your answers really fit the category
Use the full time, but don't forget to submit on time
For difficult letters like X, Y or Q: Foreign words are often allowed
